title: Extremal Problems For Finite Sets
summary: Extremal Problems For Finite Sets is a mathematics book on the extremal combinatorics of finite sets and families of finite sets. It was written by PÃ©ter Frankl and Norihide Tokushige, and published in 2018 by the American Mathematical Society as volume 86 of their Student Mathematical Library book series. The Basic Library List Committee of the Mathematical Association of America has suggested its inclusion in undergraduate mathematics libraries.[1]
